name: New Adventure (ifman1)
description:
This is my re-imagining of the classic Atari 2600 game.  I didn't have any real reason for doing it, I just had a week off and decided to try to remake this classic the same way Nintendo remade Link's Awakening.

It's a little rough around the edges, but I hope there's something here that everyone can enjoy.

There is a version on the browser over at Simmer.io:

https://simmer.io/@ifman1/new-adventure
